mapper.insert: insert into newBoard_table(boardWriter, boardTitle, boardContents, fileAttached) values (#{boardWriter}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{fileAttached})
insert into newBoard_file_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, boardId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{boardId})
mapper.select: select id, boardWriter, boardTitle, date_format(createdAt, "%y-%m-%d") as createdAt, boardHits from newBoard_table order by boardHits desc limit #{start}, #{limit}

select id, boardWriter, boardTitle, date_format(createdAt, "%y-%m-%d") as createdAt, boardHits from newBoard_table where ${type} like concat('%', #{q},'%') order by boardHits desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select count(id) from newBoard_table where ${type} like concat('%', #{q},'%')
mapper.update: update newBoard_table set boardHits = boardHits +1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: update newBoard_table set boardTitle = #{boardTitle}, boardContents = #{boardContents} where id = #{id}
